Package org.ejbca.core.ejb.ca.validation

Interface BlacklistSession

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlacklistSessionLocal, BlacklistSessionRemote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlacklistSessionBean
    public interface BlacklistSession
    Interface for public key blacklist operations.
    Version:
    $Id: BlacklistSession.java 26315 2017-08-15 08:16:04Z anatom $

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int addBlacklistEntry​(AuthenticationToken admin, BlacklistEntry entry)
      Adds a public key blacklist entry to the database.
      void changeBlacklistEntry​(AuthenticationToken admin, BlacklistEntry entry)
      Updates the public key blacklist entry with the given fingerprint.
      BlacklistEntry getBlacklistEntry​(String type, String value)
      Gets a public key blacklist entry by cache or database.
      Map<Integer,​String> getBlacklistEntryIdToValueMap()
      Retrieves a Map of all public key blacklist entry ids and fingerprints.
      void removeBlacklistEntry​(AuthenticationToken admin, String type, String value)
      Removes the public key blacklist entry.

    • Method Detail

      • addBlacklistEntry

        int addBlacklistEntry​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                      BlacklistEntry entry)
               throws AuthorizationDeniedException,
                      BlacklistExistsException
        Adds a public key blacklist entry to the database.
        Parameters:
        admin - AuthenticationToken of administrator
        entry - the public key blacklist entry to add
        Returns:
        the public key blacklist ID as added
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - required access rights are ca_functionality/edit_blacklist
        BlacklistExistsException - if public key blacklist already exists.

      • removeBlacklistEntry

        void removeBlacklistEntry​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                          String type,
                          String value)
                   throws AuthorizationDeniedException,
                          BlacklistDoesntExistsException
        Removes the public key blacklist entry.
        Parameters:
        admin - AuthenticationToken of administrator.
        type - the type of blacklist entry to remove.
        value - the fingerprint of the blacklist entry to remove.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - required access rights are ca_functionality/edit_blacklist
        BlacklistDoesntExistsException - if the public key blacklist does not exist.

      • changeBlacklistEntry

        void changeBlacklistEntry​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                          BlacklistEntry entry)
                   throws AuthorizationDeniedException,
                          BlacklistDoesntExistsException
        Updates the public key blacklist entry with the given fingerprint.
        Parameters:
        admin - AuthenticationToken of administrator.
        entry - the public key blacklist to be changed.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - required access rights are ca_functionality/edit_publickeyblacklist
        BlacklistDoesntExistsException - if there's no public key blacklist with the given fingerprint.

      • getBlacklistEntryIdToValueMap

        Map<Integer,​String> getBlacklistEntryIdToValueMap()
        Retrieves a Map of all public key blacklist entry ids and fingerprints.
        Returns:
        the map.

      • getBlacklistEntry

        BlacklistEntry getBlacklistEntry​(String type,
                                 String value)
        Gets a public key blacklist entry by cache or database.
        Parameters:
        type - type
        value - fingerprint of the public key blacklist entry, BlacklistEntry.createFingerprint
        Returns:
        a BlacklistEntry or null if a public key blacklist entry with the given fingerprint does not exist. Uses cache to get the object as quickly as possible.
